title: People Are In Splits After Pakistan Batsman Gets Run-Out 'Comically' In Match Vs Sri Lanka
text:
People Are In Splits After Pakistan Batsman Gets Run-Out 'Comically' In Match Vs Sri Lanka

People Are In Splits After Pakistan Batsman Gets Run-Out 'Comically' In Match Vs Sri Lanka

Pakistan suffered a 64 run defeat in the first T20I of the three-match series against Sri Lanka, as they failed to chase the target of 166 runs. Sri Lanka’s team is now leading with 1-0 in the series.

People lost hope as Sri Lankan bowlers Nuwan Pradeep and Isuru Udana dismissed three top-order batsmen in the match. Then, Sarfaraz Ahmed and Iftikhar Ahmed tried to save the sinking ship. But, who knew that they will also become a part of the sinking ship?

The duo scored 46 runs before they made a hilarious mistake. Sarfaraz was playing and Iftikhar was on the other side, but it was like Iftikhar was not at all interested in scoring runs. So both of them ended up at the striker's end!

Here is the picture of the incident:

This is so #Pakistan !! I don't even see such run outs in school cricket !! I wonder how they repeatedly do it with such precision !! #PAKvSL pic.twitter.com/NN41wc1WQK — Mikkhail Vaswani (@MikkhailVaswani) October 5, 2019

People were both amazed and amused at what happened on the field.

1.

Here is the footage of that inzi-youhana runout vs india at sharjah,2000. Hilarious pic.twitter.com/mBm5dkM0wl — Anurag Sinha (@anuragsinha1992) October 5, 2019

Don't Miss 2 K SHARES 3 K SHARES 1.1 K SHARES 2.2 K SHARES

2.

They are number one in t20 — Shrikant (@SachinIsLife) October 6, 2019

3.

Sir, vo pakistan players hain.. Vo kuch bhi kar sakte hain 😂 — 𝓐𝓿𝓷𝓮𝓮𝓽 𝓢𝓲𝓷𝓰𝓱 𝓐𝓥𝓘 (@AvneetSOfficial) October 5, 2019

4.

And these useless bugger's need #Kashmir — Rahul Dharangaonkar (@RAHUL_RVKD) October 6, 2019

5.

I remember way back in 2000 or 2001. Inzi & Yousuf were run out similarly vs India at Sharjah. Robin Singh ran both of them out infact on both ends. Eventually inzi walked back as he left the crease first. — Anurag Sinha (@anuragsinha1992) October 5, 2019

6.

Sri Lanka beat Pakistan by 64 runs in 1st T20I. Not only batting and bowling, Pakistan's running between the wicket was also fantastic 🤣😂🤣 #PAKvSL #PAKvsSL pic.twitter.com/a41LjzP5Wn — Sir Jadeja fan (@SirJadeja) October 5, 2019

7.

IPL 2019 also witnessed some exceptional moments on the field, and these include some very funny ones. During the Rajasthan Royals vs Delhi Capitals clash at the Sawai Mansingh Stadium in Jaipur on Monday, Stuart Binny came running into the field but missed the ball.

After Binny’s miss-field, Ben Stokes chased after the ball and slid in to make a pick-up and throw but that also didn’t work out and the ball slipped out of his hand. Stokes sported a sheepish smile after the incident.

Watch the video of the incident here:
description: Pakistan suffered a 64 run defeat in the first T20I of the 3-match series against Sri Lanka as they failed to chase the target of 166 runs. Sri Lanka’s team is now leading with 1-0 in the series. People lost hopes as Sri Lankan bowlers Nuwan Pradeep and Isuru Udana dismissed three top-order batsmen. Then Sarfaraz Ahmed and Iftikhar Ahmed tried to save the sinking ship.
